original_text: Jehoram made himself a strong king to rule over his father's kingdom. Then he killed all his brothers, as well as some of the Israelite leaders.
korean_text: 여호람이 그의 아버지의 왕국을 다스리게 되어 세력을 얻은 후에 그의 모든 아우들과 이스라엘 방백들 중 몇 사람을 칼로 죽였더라

sentences.original_text: Jehoram made himself a strong king
to rule over his father's kingdom
Then he killed all his brothers
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후 그는 자신의 모든 형제들을 죽였다

sentences.original_text: as well as some of the Israelite leaders
